screen_example.title: Welcome on The $t(common_appName.full)
screen_example.description: Do you want to discover some features? Just click on one of the three buttons at the bottom of the screen. The first allows you to call a REST API. The second lets you change the theme color. And the third allows you to change the language.

error_boundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
error_boundary.description: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later.

import.placeholder:
Enter your private key or 12, 15, 18, 21, 24 words seed phrase. 
 Separate each word with a single space if you have a seed phrase.
import.title: Import from Seed
import.description: You can import your existing wallet using the private key or a seed phrase.
import.tip: Your credentials are stored locally on your device and never leave it.
